attributes.action: Ban all political donations from organisations with named clients - like Banks - without obtaining approval in writing from those clients.
attributes.additional_details: Even if my life depended on it I would NEVER make a donation to the Labour Party, I would rather die than make a donation to the arch conman known as Ed Balls, so if I am a customer of a bank which uses named clients and customers to make a profit then they should be obliged to obtain my approval in writing before giving any money derived from profits earned from my financial actiivity to organistions I do not should even exist let alone be supported by me.  Organisations which do not take my name when I deal with them, or of which I am not a listed member, can do what they like - I can choose who I support with my feet - but others - NO!  I am not, and now never will be, a customer of the Co-operative Bank because of their carnal links with the Labour Party.
